backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, public profiles, events, chat messages, approvals, access control, and related state and helper logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping navigation-related requirements to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining color variables, dark mode theming, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and layout while handling authentication and profile-loading initialization states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChatModera: Admin UI for approving and removing chat messages with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventsMana: Admin interface for listing, creating, updating, and deleting events with dialog-based forms and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileVal: Lists public profiles and lets admins toggle validation status with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublicProf: Allows admins to select a user and edit their public profile fields, saving changes via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Statistics: Displays admin statistics such as totals for users, messages, events, and points.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout flow and displays corresponding button states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Restricts access to admin-only areas and shows an access denied message if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Redirects unauthenticated users to home and displays a sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOnbo: Redirects authenticated users to onboarding until their profile is marked complete.
Provides a button to vote on chat messages and handles duplicate or failed votes.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sponsors: Renders a grid of sponsor cards linking to external sponsor websites.
Defines the main layout with header, navigation, auth-aware links, and branding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor bound to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks to check admin status and fetch site statistics through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Derives authentication state and principal from the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Defines hooks for fetching, posting, voting, approving, and removing chat messages with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the authenticated caller’s user profile with auth and actor gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvents.ts: Provides event CRUD and RSVP hooks with query invalidation for live updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, state management, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Retrieves the leaderboard of principals and their point totals.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicProfiles.ts: Provides hooks to list, fetch, update, and validate public profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains user-related mutations for registration, onboarding, and profile saving.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports global stylesheet from the parent directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for stats, profiles, events, and chat moderation.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays the community chat feed and message posting interface with auth and onboarding checks.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityDirectoryPag: Displays a directory of public community profiles with loading, empty, and grid views, requiring authentication and onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed event information with RSVP handling, participation stats, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/EventsListPage.tsx: Lists all community events with basic details, RSVP counts, and navigation to individual event pages.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with authentication redirects, feature highlights, a hero section, and sponsor display.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a ranked leaderboard of top contributors with icons for top positions and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view points and edit private profile data with form handling and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles user registration and onboarding flow, showing project info and completing onboarding before redirecting to profile or community pages.
frontend/src/pages/PartnersPage.tsx: Displays a grid of partner organizations with logos, descriptions, and external links.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Fetches and displays a public user profile with biography, services, validation badge, and external links; handles loading and missing profiles.
frontend/src/utils/linkParsing.ts: Provides helpers to validate URLs, extract URLs from text, and generate display labels for link domains.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, implemented features, and architectural notes for the NG COIN application.
